thread.section_title: Imperial Royale Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Roaches everywhere. Need to fumigate!
thread.title_full: Roaches everywhere. Need to fumigate! - Review of Imperial Royale Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Joel G
title: Roaches everywhere. Need to fumigate!
text: I have been a regular visitor to Imperial Royale over the last two years. However my last 2 visits in the last two months have fallen way short of my expectations. I was placed in two separate rooms with cockroaches crawling all over and there's need to improve on hygiene.
